TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_trv_Uncnug_Pan, title = Uncnug_Pan, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Seediq]}, url = {https://trv.wikipedia.org/wiki/Uncnug_Pan} }

S.FORM: Uncung Pan (潘文忠, jiyax 28 idas 11 hngkawas 1962), Qbsuran Cyawyupu sayang , seejiq Yiran Taywan Sng, Pos Cyawyusyuey sapah pyasan paru Kwori Taywan Sfan, tmnegsa sapah pyasan ciway Haysan Taypeyseyn, qmnpah Cyawyu Cyucang ni Unhwacyu Cyucang Taypeyseyn, Kwocyaws Scang ni Cujen Misu mklawa ttgsa klwaan, Kwancang Kwori Peynyikwan, Fuyueycang Cyawyu Yeyncyowyueyn klwaan ni Fuscang Taycungs. Paah jiyax 20 idas 5 hngkawas 2016 do mnqpah tgkingal qbsuran mklawa ttgsa klwaan ruwan Rincyueyn Neyke. Mlutuc bukuy pnaah Kwomin cyawyu na qbsuran Cyawyupu. Jiyax 8 idas 6 hngkawas 2016 do spuan na qmeepah ka weyyueyn qpruhan kmpriyux hbangan hngkawas klwaan uri. Mnuda qmeepah Kwancang Kwori Peynyikwan, Fuyueyncang Kwocyawyueyn. Seyncang siida ka Sucncang o, qbsuran Cyawyucyu Taypeyseyn. Qmeepah Fuyueyncang Kwocyawyueyn siida, ida hiya ka pnkweyhwa 12 hngkawas kwocyaw Qekang, siida pklug gisu muda priyux cikuh Qekang. Mnrngaw ka Syawpo Wang ni Yacung Cang o yasa ini supu priyux Qekang ka Uncung Pan, kiya ni pryuxan ka sqpah na dni ini pdai ana manu qpahun da. Hici bi hngkawas 2014 do lwanan Cyawrung Rin miyah qmpah Fuscang Taycungs ni malax qnpahan na Kwocyawyueyn da. Cngce Jiyax 21 idas 5 hngkawas 2016, psgdhug 4 paru Cngce- " Laxan hngkawas 103 kpruyux Qekang, sngayun 1 hngkawas ka gmbgurah uuda tgbaraw cyawyu, phiyug 50 hnpucing hbangan knparu na cicin, muda gmbgurah pyasan paru, kmpriyux, malax qnpahan dnii uuda ni psgdhug 12 hngkawas Kwocyaw, mquri uxay muda pspung matas ka hici".

Uncong Pan (潘文忠, jiyax 28 idas 11 hngkawas 1962), Qbsoran Cyawyopo sayang , seejiq Yiran Taywan Sng, Pos Cyawyosyoey sapah pyasan paro Kwori Taywan Sfan, tmnegsa sapah pyasan ciway Haysan Taypeyseyn, qmnpah Cyawyo Cyocang ni Unhwacyo Cyocang Taypeyseyn, Kwocyaws Scang ni Cojen Miso mklawa ttgsa klwaan, Kwancang Kwori Peynyikwan, Foyoeycang Cyawyo Yeyncyowyoeyn klwaan ni Foscang Taycongs. Paah jiyax 20 idas 5 hngkawas 2016 do mnqpah tgkingal qbsoran mklawa ttgsa klwaan rowan Rincyoeyn Neyke. Mlotoc bokoy pnaah Kwomin cyawyo na qbsoran Cyawyopo. Jiyax 8 idas 6 hngkawas 2016 do spoan na qmeepah ka weyyoeyn qprohan kmpriyox hbangan hngkawas klwaan ori. Mnoda qmeepah Kwancang Kwori Peynyikwan, Foyoeyncang Kwocyawyoeyn. Seyncang siida ka Socncang o, qbsoran Cyawyocyo Taypeyseyn. Qmeepah Foyoeyncang Kwocyawyoeyn siida, ida hiya ka pnkweyhwa 12 hngkawas kwocyaw Qekang, siida pklog giso moda priyox cikoh Qekang. Mnrngaw ka Syawpo Wang ni Yacong Cang o yasa ini sopo priyox Qekang ka Uncong Pan, kiya ni pryoxan ka sqpah na dni ini pdai ana mano qpahon da. Hici bi hngkawas 2014 do lwanan Cyawrong Rin miyah qmpah Foscang Taycongs ni malax qnpahan na Kwocyawyoeyn da. Cngce Jiyax 21 idas 5 hngkawas 2016, psgdhog 4 paro Cngce- " Laxan hngkawas 103 kproyox Qekang, sngayon 1 hngkawas ka gmbgorah ooda tgbaraw cyawyo, phiyog 50 hnpocing hbangan knparo na cicin, moda gmbgorah pyasan paro, kmpriyox, malax qnpahan dnii ooda ni psgdhog 12 hngkawas Kwocyaw, mqori oxay moda pspong matas ka hici".
